TECHNIQUE.name: Rudder SNMP Configuration
TECHNIQUE.DESCRIPTION:
Configuration of the SNMP service and rudder agent monitoring.
Snmpd will be installed if needed, and the required configuration will be appended to `/etc/snmp/snmpd.conf`, without destroying any existing user config.
TECHNIQUE.DEPRECATED: This technique version is not maintained anymore, it will no longer be available in the next version of Rudder.

SECTION.name: Presence of a scripts directory whithin /etc/snmp/
Presence of the rudder agent health evaluation script whithin /etc/snmp/scripts/
Presence of the SNMP server package
SNMP configuration file contains required OID and community
Execution permission for the rudder agent health evaluation script
Ensure SNMP service is enabled at boot time
